languages.text: "Боюсь, ты не сможешь ему их задать — Лорд-инквизитор покинул Футфол. Он доверил мне оборону системы Фурибундус, а сам в большой спешке отбыл на секретную миссию. Ее детали никому не известны". {n}В голосе Инцендии чудится нотка ревнивой обиды.{/n}

"I'm afraid you will not have the opportunity to ask them — the Lord Inquisitor has left Footfall. He charged me with the defence of the Furibundus System and departed on a secret mission in great haste. None are privy to its details." {n}Incendia's tone carries a note of wounded pride.{/n}

traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “恐怕你已经没机会问他们了，大审判官已经离开了落脚港。他把守护怒焰星系的任务交给了我，随后就匆匆忙忙地执行某项秘密任务了。没人知道任务的具体细节。”{n}因森蒂娅的语气听起来像是自尊心受了伤。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid you will not have the opportunity to ask them — the Lord Inquisitor has left Footfall. He charged me with the defence of the Furibundus System and departed on a secret mission in great haste. None are privy to its details." {n}Incendia's tone carries a note of wounded pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “恐怕你已经没机会问他们了，审判长已经离开了落脚港。他把守护怒焰星系的任务交给了我，随后就匆匆忙忙地执行某项秘密任务了。没人知道任务的具体细节。”{n}因森蒂娅的语气听起来像是自尊心受了伤。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「残念だが、お前が尋ねる機会はないだろう。ロード・インクィジターはフットフォールから去った。彼は私にフュリバンダス星系の防衛を命じ、大急ぎで極秘任務に向かった。任務の詳細を知る者はいない」{n}インセンディアの声には傷つけられたプライドの色があった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid you will not have the opportunity to ask them — the Lord Inquisitor has left Footfall. He charged me with the defence of the Furibundus System and departed on a secret mission in great haste. None are privy to its details." {n}Incendia's tone carries a note of wounded pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「残念だが、お前が尋ねる機会はないだろう。ロード・インクィジターはフットフォールから去った。彼は私にフュリバンダス星系の防衛を命じ、大急ぎで極秘任務に向かった。任務の詳細を知る者はいない」{n}インセンディアの声には傷つけられたプライドの色があった。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Me temo que no tendrá oportunidad de hacerlas. El Lord Inquisidor ha dejado Paso. Me puso al mando de la defensa del sistema Furibundus y partió en una misión secreta a toda prisa. Nadie conoce los detalles». {n}El tono de Incendia denota un orgullo herido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid you will not have the opportunity to ask them — the Lord Inquisitor has left Footfall. He charged me with the defence of the Furibundus System and departed on a secret mission in great haste. None are privy to its details." {n}Incendia's tone carries a note of wounded pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que no podrá hacerlas. El Lord Inquisidor ha dejado Paso. Me puso al mando de la defensa del sistema Furibundus y partió en una misión secreta a toda prisa. Nadie conoce los detalles». {n}El tono de Incendia denota un orgullo herido.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, Ihr werdet keine Gelegenheit haben, sie zu stellen. Der Großinquisitor hat Footfall verlassen. Er hat mich mit der Verteidigung des Furibundus-Systems betraut und ist in großer Eile zu einer geheimen Mission aufgebrochen. Niemand kennt Einzelheiten." {n}Verwundeter Stolz liegt in Incendias Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid you will not have the opportunity to ask them — the Lord Inquisitor has left Footfall. He charged me with the defence of the Furibundus System and departed on a secret mission in great haste. None are privy to its details." {n}Incendia's tone carries a note of wounded pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, Ihr werdet sie nicht stellen können. Der Großinquisitor hat Footfall verlassen. Er hat mich mit der Verteidigung des Furibundus-Systems betraut und ist in großer Eile zu einer geheimen Mission aufgebrochen. Niemand kennt Einzelheiten." {n}Verwundeter Stolz liegt in Incendias Stimme.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Je crains que vous n'en ayez pas l'occasion, car le seigneur inquisiteur a quitté Castel. Il m'a chargée de défendre le système de Furibundus avant de partir en toute hâte pour une mission secrète dont nous ignorons tout, » {n}explique-t-elle sur un ton qui laisse transparaître sa fierté meurtrie.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid you will not have the opportunity to ask them — the Lord Inquisitor has left Footfall. He charged me with the defence of the Furibundus System and departed on a secret mission in great haste. None are privy to its details." {n}Incendia's tone carries a note of wounded pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que ce soit impossible, car le seigneur inquisiteur a quitté Castel. Il m'a chargée de défendre le système de Furibundus avant de partir en toute hâte pour une mission secrète dont nous ignorons tout, » {n}explique-t-elle sur un ton qui laisse transparaître sa fierté meurtrie.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Korkarım onları soracak fırsatın olmayacak. Lord Engizisyoncu, Binliman'dan ayrıldı. Furibundus Sistemi'nin savunmasıyla beni görevlendirip büyük bir aceleyle gizli bir göreve çıktı. Detaylarını bilen yok." {n}İncendia'nın yara almış gururu, ses tonuna yansıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid you will not have the opportunity to ask them — the Lord Inquisitor has left Footfall. He charged me with the defence of the Furibundus System and departed on a secret mission in great haste. None are privy to its details." {n}Incendia's tone carries a note of wounded pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Korkarım onları soracak fırsatın olmayacak, Lord Engizisyoncu, Binliman'dan ayrıldı. Furibundus Sistemi'nin savunmasıyla beni görevlendirdi ve büyük bir aceleyle gizli bir göreve çıktı. Detayları hakkında bilgi sahibi olan yok." {n}İncendia'nın yara almış gururu, ses tonuna yansıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
